SELECT count(u.id) as count FROM t_whs_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, CONCAT('￥',CONVERT(FORMAT(SUM(payable_fee)/100.0,2),CHAR),'/',CONVERT(COUNT(id),CHAR),'次') as thisMonth FROM t_whs_order WHERE order_status = 'received' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m') GROUP BY user_id ) as t1 ON u.id = t1.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, CONCAT('￥',CONVERT(FORMAT(SUM(payable_fee)/100.0,2),CHAR),'/',CONVERT(COUNT(id),CHAR),'次') as lastMonth FROM t_whs_order WHERE order_status = 'received' AND date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY user_id ) as t2 ON u.id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, CONCAT('￥',CONVERT(FORMAT(SUM(payable_fee)/100.0,2),CHAR),'/',CONVERT(COUNT(id),CHAR),'次') as accumulative FROM t_whs_order WHERE order_status = 'received' GROUP BY user_id ) as t3 ON u.id = t3.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, CONCAT('￥',CONVERT(FORMAT(SUM(payable_fee)/100.0,2),CHAR),'/',CONVERT(COUNT(id),CHAR),'次') as arrears FROM t_whs_order WHERE settlement_type = 'offline' and pay_status = 'unpaid' GROUP BY user_id ) as t4 ON u.id = t4.user_id LEFT JOIN t_whs_salesuser_relation sr ON u.id = sr.user_id LEFT JOIN t_whs_salesuser s ON sr.salesman_id = s.id
and u.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%') and u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%') and s.id = #{saleId} and u.register_time >= #{beginTime} and u.register_time <=#{endTime}

and u.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%') and u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%') and s.id = #{saleId} and date_format(u.register_time,'%Y-%m-%d) >= #{beginTime} and date_format(u.register_time,'%Y-%m-%d) <=#{endTime}
